title: Ticket #367: Schedd stuck in RequestService()
description:
Email from Ken:

Nick and I saw this on a schedd that appears not to be responding to condor_q (failed to fetch ads.. schedd log didn't even show the connection)

Nick wanted me to pass along 3 gdb atttaches. ... -Ken

We eventually had to hard kill the schedd... As you can see below, it was stuck in RequestService(). 

#0  0x0000003b1f4c5620 in __read_nocancel () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#1  0x0000000000837796 in Generic_read ()
#2  0x000000000082f906 in __wrap_read ()
#3  0x000000000064bcc6 in RequestService ()
#4  0x000000000064bee2 in RemoveLocalOrRemoteFile ()
#5  0x00000000004fc970 in cleanup_ckpt_files ()
#6  0x0000000000534c7b in DestroyProc ()

#10 0x00000000005a91b0 in TimerManager::Timeout ()
#11 0x0000000000599af3 in DaemonCore::Driver ()
#12 0x00000000005a3610 in main ()
